Docs.param: Type of backup managemenent for the container. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'AzureIaasVM', 'MAB', 'DPM', 'AzureBackupServer', 'AzureSql'
Status of registration of the container with the Recovery Services Vault.
Status of health of the container.

Type of the container. The value of this property for: 1. Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines 2. Classic Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines 3. Windows machines (like MAB, DPM etc) is Windows 4. Azure SQL instance is AzureSqlContainer. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Unknown', 'IaasVMContainer', 'IaasVMServiceContainer', 'DPMContainer', 'AzureBackupServerContainer', 'MABContainer', 'Cluster', 'AzureSqlContainer', 'Windows', 'VCenter'
